DefectReportPDF.regular_polygon¶

DefectReportPDF.regular_polygon(x, y, numSides, polyWidth, rotateDegrees=0, style=None)¶

Outputs a regular polygon with n sides It can be rotated Style can also be applied (fill, border…)

Parameters

  • x (float) – Abscissa of upper-left bounding box.

  • y (float) – Ordinate of upper-left bounding box.

  • numSides (int) – Number of sides for polygon.

  • polyWidth (float) – width of the polygon.

  • rotateDegrees (float) – degree amount to rotate polygon. (can be left blank)

  • style (str) – Style of rendering. Possible values are: (can be left blank) * D or None: draw border. This is the default value. * F: fill * DF or FD: draw and fill

Previous topic

DefectReportPDF.rect_clip

Next topic

DefectReportPDF.rotate
